description: Detects service path modification via the "sc" binary to a suspicious command or path
name: Suspicious Service Path Modification
query: (process.executable:*\\sc.exe AND process.command_line:*config* AND process.command_line:*binPath* AND process.command_line:(*powershell* OR *cmd* OR *mshta* OR *wscript* OR *cscript* OR *rundll32* OR *C\:\\Users\\Public* OR *\\Downloads\\* OR *\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start\ Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\TEMP\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp*))
author: Victor Sergeev
oscd.community
Nasreddine Bencherchali (update)
